answerText: chromaffin cells [10] Chromaffin cells develop from these embryonic cells, which are also precursors to Schwann cells, melanocytes and cranial nerve cells.

question: Question: Clusters of these cells are found in paraganglions. For 10 points each: [10] Name these cells that are typically found in the medulla of the adrenal gland.
